item.description:
This Meetup is for those folks interested in this year's CHALLENGE from Ed Dale.

What used to be known as the 30 Day Challenge has been renamed "The Challenge"; and somewhat simplified with the hopes of more participants successfully attaining the challenge goal = Sell something online and make $1 by August 31st.

The Challenge is a great way to learn the latest internet marketing strategies and tactics - even veteran marketers will pick up some new info and the trainings are quick & easy!

Here's the link to the Challenge HQ
http://www.challenge....

Come join us at Margarita's in Waltham for an informal meetup to discuss strategies and status reports.
The heart of the challenge will really be kicking in with this weeks trainings so don't give up - show up! and get help from fellow challenge participants.

STAY TUNED TO THE DATE CONFIRMATION - Margarita's still needs to confirm we have space for Wednesday but I wanted to get the meetup alert out!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Boston Internet Marketing Meetup sign - we should be in the front room
item.name: Thirty Day Challenge Meetup - Boston Internet Marketing Meetup
